metadata.title: CVE-2023-6918 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the libssh implements abstract layer for message digest(MD) operations implemented by different supported crypto backends. Thereturn values from these were not properly checked, which could causelow-memory situations failures, NULL dereferences, crashes, or usage of theuninitialized memory as an input for the KDF. In this case, non-matchingkeys will result in decryption/integrity failures, terminating theconnection.

criterions.comment: libssh package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
